title: A well built house and 128 perches for sale
details:
This property is situated at Akuressa road, Howpe just off the main road.
5 bedrooms,big living areas, attached bathroom with hot water and bath tub, very big house. Ideal for a villa or cuircuit bungalow. Closed to the Imaduwa highway entrance.

NB:
House inspection with our real estate agent only. No direction.
